alert.note: Alert for Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 23 at 2:24AM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Turner County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated stronger winds are possible near any thunderstorms. The strong winds will also lead to elevated fire danger.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
